NORTH KINGSTON , R.I. ( WWLP ) - More than 50,000 people had an eye to the sky during the Rhode Island National Guard Open House and Airshow .
The Airshow had a local connection .
Both modern and vintage fighter aircraft flew in formation and performed maneuvers .
Kids checked out the aircraft and volunteers raised money for military family organizations .
